doc:
Tushka Bergen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tushka_Bergen 0 Tushka Bergen (born 13 October 1969, in London, England) is an Australian actress who has worked in Australia, England, Germany and the United States. In 1988, she was nominated for the AACTA Award for Best Performance by an Actress in a Mini Series for her role in Always Afternoon.Her mother is Beverley Bergen, an opera singer and scriptwriter. Her father is Anthony Hose, a conductor and pianist. She is married to CNN International presenter John Vause, with whom she has one daughter, Katie Vause, born in 2004. Tushka_Bergen ( born 13_October_1969 , in London , England ) is an_Australian_actress who has_worked in Australia , England , Germany and the_United_States . In 1988 , she was_nominated for the_AACTA_Award for Best Performance by an_Actress in a_Mini_Series for her_role in Always_Afternoon.Her_mother is Beverley_Bergen , an_opera_singer_and_scriptwriter . Her_father is Anthony_Hose , a_conductor_and_pianist . She is_married to CNN_International_presenter_John_Vause , with whom she has one_daughter , Katie_Vause , born in 2004 .
